projects.name: Ck newsletter
projects.description: This is a newsletter service that aims to aid small and mid-sized bloggers. It automates the process of keeping subscribers in sync with the latest articles. Blogger can start using this service by just minimal one-time setup.
projects.technologies: NodeJs, ExpressJs, ReactJs, MongooseJs, Styled-Components, Webpack

projects.name: Ck Gatsby blog
projects.description: This is a beautiful and featureful gatsby blog starter for writers. I have built this blog starter intending to give more features with a beautiful look that makes it different from other available
projects.technologies: Gatsby, Graphql, Styled-components, Sass, React icons

projects.name: InstaAds - An advertisement platform for businesses
projects.description: This is an advertisement B2B platform. It allows to businessmen to post about their business on this platform to increase the reach of their business and products. It's built in collaboration.
projects.technologies: Express, MongoDB, React, Ant design, and styled-components

projects.name: Galaxy - Application Management System
projects.description: It is a throwback to AltCampus. I have built this Application Management System with my team of 5 developers. I was responsible for building the server to power application. This is a fantastic real-world app
projects.technologies: NodeJs, ExpresJs, ReactJs, Redux, Ant design, MongoDB, MongooseJs

projects.name: Testing Isomorphic react app
projects.description: This app is built using the test-driven development approach. I have written tests with Jest for this Isomorphic react app.
projects.technologies: React, Jest

projects.name: Time tracker app
projects.description: This react web app offers features like record the start time and end time of a task with a tag. This app built using React, Apollo Client, and Graphql to interact with the server.
projects.technologies: ReactJs, Apollo client, Graphql, Material UI

projects.name: Cknewsletter_hook npm package
projects.description: A package to help CK newsletter service users to use two methods to make requests on cknewsletter.tech for subscribing and pushing slug or item id.
projects.technologies: javaScript

projects.name: Hasura GraphQl Engine - Open Source contribution
projects.description: This is an open-source product that connects to your databases and services and gives you a realtime GraphQL API, instantly. I have added missing examples to API docs.
projects.technologies: markdown

projects.name: MERN - Open Source contribution
projects.description: This is boilerplate for MERN stack with integrations like Redux and SSR. I have added webpack files to the webback directory.
projects.technologies: webpack

projects.name: Top blog - Fully functional blog app for writers and readers
projects.description: Sharing knowledge with creativity has a huge impact on the community. It is the best thing one writer should do. I have built this app to help bloggers to share their knowledge with the creativity of writing skills. I have developed this Full Stack Web App to facilitate bloggers.
projects.technologies: ReactJS, ExpressJs, CSS grids and styled-components etc.

projects.name: Neighborhood Map
projects.description: This is a Neighborhood map PWA app. It facilitates a user to find neighborhood places. I built this app with Google maps API and Foursquare API. It has a service worker. So, People can use this app even if the device is offline or in low internet connectivity.
projects.technologies: ReactJS, Google Maps API, FourSquoure API and Service workers

projects.name: City Bazzar - eCommerce platform
projects.description: It is an eCommerce app. I had launched this service to help people to order daily groceries in COVID-19 pandemic. I received a great positive response and feedback from people. I learned to run a small business and learned how to deal with obstacles
projects.technologies: React, Context API, Styled-components and Sass

projects.name: Exercise tracker API
projects.description: The exercise tracker is an API that allows a dev to perform CRUD operation without building a separate Back End from scratch. Dev needs to fork and deploy this repo. I learned to create APIs with Express, MongoDB and Mongoose.
projects.technologies: Express, MongoDB and Mongoose

projects.name: Flappy bird
projects.description: The flappy bird game is one of the fun game. Make a High score and break it in next play. I have tested my new-found knowledge of Object oriented JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas.
projects.technologies: javaScript, OOP and HTML5 Canvas

projects.name: MyReads - A book tracking app
projects.description: The flappy bird game is one of the funny game. Make a High score and break it in next play, Or you might not able to break the last high score. This app is built with Object-oriented JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas
projects.technologies: ReactJS, React-Router

projects.name: Restaurant Reviews App
projects.description: The book library app that facilitates a user to perform a search, select and categorise books in 'have to read', 'are currently reading' or 'want to read'. I developed the functionalities of this app.
projects.technologies: Mapbox API, HTML, CSS Grids, A11Y and Service Workers

projects.name: Classic Arcade Game
projects.description: An HTML Canvas powered basic video game. This game is built atop object-oriented javaScript. Let's see, how good are you at gaming.
projects.technologies: javaScript Classes, HTML5 Canvas

projects.name: Github Battle Royal
projects.description: It's a funny Github battle app where a user needs to enter two Github usernames and click on the battle button. It will show the warrior. It compares users Github profile to show the result
projects.technologies: javaScript, Github APIs, HTML and CSS

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: A shnazzy, well-designed, feature-packed memory game! I have built this game to refresh your memories.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, HTML and CSS

projects.name: Voice Notes - Now write with voice
projects.description: Tired of typing, try this new tool to boost your productivity while writing. You need to speak what you type. It will take care to record and convert your voice into text. I have built this fantastic app for writers who are more comfortable with speaking.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, HTML and CSS
